doc.field: Adler & Neilson Iron Work Company architectural drawings
Adler & Neilson Iron Work Company architectural drawings

Brooklyn Museum, 1990 (7 folders); John Jay College, 1991; Brooklyn Army Terminal, 1991; AT and T (ATT) 32 Avenue of the Americas (Sixth Ave.), 1992; "Miscellaneous" (all circa 1980s): Shearson Lehman, Greenwich St., Davidoff of Geneva, Madison Ave., NYC; New York Stock Exchange; Conde Nast, Madison Ave.; Emigrant Savings Bank, Broadway, NYC; Smith and Wollensky, 49th St., NYC; Hotel Markwell, 49th St., NYC; Westbury Hotel, 69th St., NYC; Lenox Hill Hospital, 84th St., NYC; International Design Center (IDC), Long Island City, NY; Kress Foundation, 80th St., NYC; Chase Manhattan, Pine St., Fordham University; Seidman and Seidman, Columbus Circle; Merrill Lynch, Fifth Ave.; East New York Savings Bank; Federated Department Store, Broadway, NYC; Federal Reserve Bank; Barnes and Noble; Teamsters Local 807; Dime Savings Bank, Ocean Ave., Brooklyn, NY; Cabrini Medical Center, 19th St., NYC; Doral Park Avenue Hotel; Second Avenue Theater at 12th St., NYC
